ing: 6 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
4 fluid ounces lemonade, or to taste
des: "It is my own personal recipe; it is not in any recipe book."
ins: Crush mint leaves with a wooden spoon in the bottom of a glass. Add bourbon and maple syrup. Fill the glass with ice, pour lemonade over the top to fill the glass, and stir. Garnish with mint sprig and lemon wedge.
